Merrill then transformed his leadership style, prioritizing well-being and fostering a human-centered workplace at Zibtek.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/software-startup-founder-chased-growth-with-70-hour-weeks-until-his-childs-question-exposed-the-main-problem-with-his-work-life-balance/articleshow/123188084.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/software-startup-founder-chased-growth-with-70-hour-weeks-until-his-childs-question-exposed-the-main-problem-with-his-work-life-balance/articleshow/123188084.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 17:14:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="42926" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123188069,imgsize-42926.cms"/></item><item><title>Love gone wild: Indian man faces deportation for harassing UK woman for 6 months</title><description><![CDATA[Asish Jose Paul, an Indian national, is facing deportation from the UK. He stalked Lutaruta Masiulonyte, his colleague at London Zoo. Paul ignored police warnings and a restraining order. He sent her texts, flowers, and chocolates. The court sentenced him to a suspended prison term and a restraining order. Masiulonyte reported feeling scared and anxious due to his actions.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/uk/love-gone-wild-indian-man-faces-deportation-for-harassing-uk-zoo-colleague-for-6-months-didnt-stop-even-after-restraining-order/articleshow/123188285.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/uk/love-gone-wild-indian-man-faces-deportation-for-harassing-uk-zoo-colleague-for-6-months-didnt-stop-even-after-restraining-order/articleshow/123188285.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 17:35:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="971541" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123188532,imgsize-971541.cms"/></item><item><title>'AI Mark': British MP becomes available 24/7; bot talks back in his voice</title><description><![CDATA[Mark Sewards, a British MP, has introduced 'AI Mark'. It focuses on local casework and policy issues. However, the chatbot has faced criticism.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/uk/ai-mark-british-mp-becomes-available-24/7-bot-clone-talks-back-in-his-voice/articleshow/123187653.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/uk/ai-mark-british-mp-becomes-available-24/7-bot-clone-talks-back-in-his-voice/articleshow/123187653.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 17:22:07 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="30086" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123187886,imgsize-30086.cms"/></item><item><title>'Gathering of friendship': China welcomes PM Modi for SCO Tianjin Summit</title><description><![CDATA[China has extended a warm welcome to Prime Minister Narendra Modi for the upcoming Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO) Summit in Tianjin, scheduled for August 31 to September 1. This visit marks PM Modi's first trip to China since the 2020 Galwan Valley clash. The summit aims to foster regional security, economic cooperation, and address geopolitical issues among member states.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/gathering-of-friendship-china-welcomes-pm-modi-for-sco-tianjin-summit-signal-thaw-in-ties/articleshow/123188341.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/gathering-of-friendship-china-welcomes-pm-modi-for-sco-tianjin-summit-signal-thaw-in-ties/articleshow/123188341.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 17:29:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="713879" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123188449,imgsize-713879.cms"/></item><item><title>OpenAI CEO Sam Altman at GPT-5 launch: India is our second-largest market</title><description><![CDATA[OpenAI has launched GPT-5, its most advanced AI model, boasting significant improvements in accuracy, speed, and reasoning. GPT-5 is available in various sizes and tiers, including a free version, with enhanced versions for Team, Enterprise, Edu, and Pro users, marking a step towards Artificial General Intelligence.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-ceo-sam-altman-at-gpt-5-launch-india-is-our-second-largest-marketbut-what-users-are-doing-with/articleshow/123178437.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-ceo-sam-altman-at-gpt-5-launch-india-is-our-second-largest-marketbut-what-users-are-doing-with/articleshow/123178437.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 08:15:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="20958" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123178434,imgsize-20958.cms"/></item><item><title>Ground invasion in Gaza? Israel military building up troops, equipment near border</title><description><![CDATA[Commercial satellite images indicate a significant buildup of Israeli troops and equipment along the Gaza border, potentially signaling preparations for a new ground assault. This follows the Israeli security cabinet's approval of a plan to take control of Gaza City, a move short of a full occupation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/middle-east/ground-invasion-in-gaza-israel-military-building-up-troops-equipment-near-border-report/articleshow/123183462.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/middle-east/ground-invasion-in-gaza-israel-military-building-up-troops-equipment-near-border-report/articleshow/123183462.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 15:25:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="71630" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123185986,imgsize-71630.cms"/></item><item><title>Navratilova once shared how her tennis image was shaped by rival Evert’s upbringing</title><description><![CDATA[Martina Navratilova's comments sparked renewed interest in Chris Evert. Navratilova suggested Evert's strict Catholic upbringing shaped her public image. She contrasted this with her own experiences growing up in Czechoslovakia. Navratilova noted Evert's desire to please her parents influenced her behavior. The remarks added a new layer to their famous rivalry. Their contrasting styles fueled tennis's growth.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/international-sports/more-than-any-american-culture-martina-navratilova-once-shared-how-chris-everts-catholic-upbringing-shaped-her-tennis-image/articleshow/123175846.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/international-sports/more-than-any-american-culture-martina-navratilova-once-shared-how-chris-everts-catholic-upbringing-shaped-her-tennis-image/articleshow/123175846.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 04:33:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1369485" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123175824,imgsize-1369485.cms"/></item><item><title>Asia Cup: Is India vs Pakistan under threat? Emirates Cricket Board assures the high-voltage match will likely happen. The tournament is scheduled from September 9 to 28 in Dubai and Abu Dhabi. India will face Pakistan on September 14 at Dubai International Cricket Stadium. There are chances of further encounters in Super 4s and the final.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/asia-cup-2025-is-india-vs-pakistan-under-threat-uae-cricket-boards-coo-provides-clarity/articleshow/123186926.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/asia-cup-2025-is-india-vs-pakistan-under-threat-uae-cricket-boards-coo-provides-clarity/articleshow/123186926.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 16:23:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="21352" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123187303,imgsize-21352.cms"/></item><item><title>'Took oath inside Parliament': Rahul Gandhi responds to EC's 'sign affidavit' dare</title><description><![CDATA[Congress leader Rahul Gandhi intensified his "vote theft" allegations at a Bengaluru rally, demanding the Election Commission (EC) provide the complete electronic voter list and video records. He claimed some state election websites were taken down after Congress's expose. Gandhi warned EC officials of consequences, accusing them of attacking the constitution. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/took-oath-inside-parliament-rahul-gandhi-responds-to-ecs-sign-affidavit-dare-demands-full-e-voter-data/articleshow/123183426.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/took-oath-inside-parliament-rahul-gandhi-responds-to-ecs-sign-affidavit-dare-demands-full-e-voter-data/articleshow/123183426.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 13:44:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="789804" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123184103,imgsize-789804.cms"/></item><item><title>India’s 3rd launch pad In Sriharikota only by March 2029</title><description><![CDATA[India's space program is set for a boost with a third launch pad at Sriharikota, slated for completion by March 2029. This facility will primarily support the Next Generation Launch Vehicle (NGLV) and act as a backup for heavy-lift vehicles. The project emphasizes collaboration with Indian private players and MSMEs, aligning with the nation's self-reliance goals.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/indias-3rd-launch-pad-in-sriharikota-only-by-march-2029/articleshow/123187380.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/indias-3rd-launch-pad-in-sriharikota-only-by-march-2029/articleshow/123187380.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 16:30:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>CHETHAN KUMAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1305886" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123187533,imgsize-1305886.cms"/></item><item><title>Torrential rains wreak havoc in China: 10 dead, 33 missing; Xi calls for rescue push</title><description><![CDATA[Flash floods in China's Gansu province caused immense destruction. Ten people died, and 33 remain missing. Continuous heavy rainfall triggered the disaster. President Xi Jinping urged utmost rescue efforts. Emergency teams are searching for the missing. The meteorological department warned of continued rainfall. Gansu is prone to floods during the monsoon season. The disaster follows recent heavy rainfall in Beijing.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/china/torrential-rains-wreak-havoc-in-china-10-dead-33-missing-xi-calls-for-rescue-push/articleshow/123186564.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/china/torrential-rains-wreak-havoc-in-china-10-dead-33-missing-xi-calls-for-rescue-push/articleshow/123186564.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 16:02:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="380968" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123186930,imgsize-380968.cms"/></item><item><title>New Income-Tax Bill: Why Centre withdrew legislation from Lok Sabha</title><description><![CDATA[The Income-Tax Bill, 2025, initially introduced in February, has been withdrawn by the government to prevent confusion. A revised version, incorporating recommendations from the Select Committee led by BJP MP Baijayant Panda, is set to be presented in the Lok Sabha on August 11.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/new-income-tax-bill-why-has-centre-withdrawn-the-bill-from-lok-sabha-revised-draft-to-reflect-parliament-panel-suggestions/articleshow/123186665.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/new-income-tax-bill-why-has-centre-withdrawn-the-bill-from-lok-sabha-revised-draft-to-reflect-parliament-panel-suggestions/articleshow/123186665.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 15:48:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="164753" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123186662,imgsize-164753.cms"/></item><item><title>754 runs not enough? 'Jadeja 'more consistent' than Shubman Gill'</title><description><![CDATA[Ajay Jadeja lauded Ravindra Jadeja's remarkable all-round display in England, highlighting his consistency with both bat and ball. Despite Shubman Gill's impressive 754 runs, Ajay emphasized Ravindra's crucial contributions, particularly his resilience in pressure situations. His performances at Lord's and throughout the series showcased his fortitude, making him a standout performer in the drawn series.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ravindra-jadeja-more-consistent-than-shubman-gill-big-statement-shakes-up-england-series-verdict/articleshow/123185236.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ravindra-jadeja-more-consistent-than-shubman-gill-big-statement-shakes-up-england-series-verdict/articleshow/123185236.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 14:53:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="45538" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123185378,imgsize-45538.cms"/></item><item><title>Humanitarian aid: Trump 'began yelling' at Netanyahu on phone over Gaza starvation</title><description><![CDATA[A heated phone exchange occurred between Benjamin Netanyahu and Donald Trump over Gaza's humanitarian crisis, as reported by NBC News. Trump contradicted Netanyahu's denial of starvation in Gaza, citing images of hungry children. Netanyahu insisted reports were fabricated by Hamas, but Trump asserted he had seen proof of starvation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/middle-east/humanitarian-aid-row-trump-began-yelling-at-netanyahu-on-phone-over-gaza-starvation-report/articleshow/123183531.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/middle-east/humanitarian-aid-row-trump-began-yelling-at-netanyahu-on-phone-over-gaza-starvation-report/articleshow/123183531.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 13:15:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1744215" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123183484,imgsize-1744215.cms"/></item><item><title>Priyanka Gandhi slams Election Commission; backs Rahul's claims of voter fraud</title><description><![CDATA[Priyanka Gandhi Vadra has criticized the Election Commission, urging an investigation into Rahul Gandhi's allegations of widespread voter fraud. She questioned the EC's impartiality, suggesting a bias towards the BJP and accusing the poll body of ignoring evidence while focusing on procedural demands. The EC defends its stance, requiring a formal declaration from Rahul Gandhi before initiating any action.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/big-kaand-happening-under-ecs-nose-priyanka-gandhi-slams-poll-body-backs-rahuls-claims-of-voter-fraud/articleshow/123186416.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/big-kaand-happening-under-ecs-nose-priyanka-gandhi-slams-poll-body-backs-rahuls-claims-of-voter-fraud/articleshow/123186416.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 16:06:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1101200" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123187007,imgsize-1101200.cms"/></item><item><title>Triple H on the cricket field? He stood in men's and women's cricket games. His career spanned over two decades. The video has gone viral online.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/triple-h-on-the-cricket-field-umpires-wwe-inspired-act-goes-viral-watch/articleshow/123186101.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/triple-h-on-the-cricket-field-umpires-wwe-inspired-act-goes-viral-watch/articleshow/123186101.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 15:29:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="47304" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123186151,imgsize-47304.cms"/></item><item><title>These 15 science facts are so bizarre, you'll think we're lying (but we're not)</title><description><![CDATA[Science reveals bizarre truths. Bananas are slightly radioactive. Stomachs digest themselves. Earth has more trees than stars. A teaspoon of neutron star weighs billions of tons. One can survive briefly in space without a suit. Wombat poop is cube-shaped. Octopuses possess multiple hearts and brains. Even spiders have journeyed to space.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/these-15-science-facts-are-so-bizarre-youll-think-were-lying-but-were-not/articleshow/123186402.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/these-15-science-facts-are-so-bizarre-youll-think-were-lying-but-were-not/articleshow/123186402.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 15:55:09 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="45736" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123186739,imgsize-45736.cms"/></item><item><title>Elon Musk updates Mars mission timeline: Starship crewed by Optimus possible in 2026; real target now 2028–2030</title><description><![CDATA[Elon Musk has adjusted SpaceX's Mars mission timeline, pushing back the potential Starship launch to 2028 for an uncrewed flight and 2030 for a crewed mission. Delhi Chief Minister Rekha Gupta intervened, ordering an investigation and swift action. It includes images and GIFs for the festival. The content focuses on expressing love and strengthening sibling relationships. It shares greetings for a joyous celebration.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/relationships/family/happy-raksha-bandhan-2025-images-quotes-wishes-messages-cards-greetings-pictures-facebook-and-whatsapp-status-and-gifs/articleshow/123143356.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/relationships/family/happy-raksha-bandhan-2025-images-quotes-wishes-messages-cards-greetings-pictures-facebook-and-whatsapp-status-and-gifs/articleshow/123143356.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 21:00:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="36154" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123143356,imgsize-36154.cms"/></item><item><title>'It was like hills were chasing us': Friends who dodged death in Uttarkashi</title><description><![CDATA[A flash flood in Dharali, Uttarkashi, triggered by the Kheer Gad stream, has left a trail of destruction. Trump's tariffs aim to pressure Russia over the Ukraine war, creating a complex situation for India's energy security and trade relations.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trump-tariffs-how-much-will-indias-fuel-bill-rise-if-it-stops-russian-crude-oil-imports-where-would-it-buy-from-explained/articleshow/123184667.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trump-tariffs-how-much-will-indias-fuel-bill-rise-if-it-stops-russian-crude-oil-imports-where-would-it-buy-from-explained/articleshow/123184667.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 14:28:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="89236" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123184770,imgsize-89236.cms"/></item><item><title>'Lost 53 hours and 21 minutes': Kiren Rijiju on Parliament logjam</title><description><![CDATA[Kiren Rijiju expressed concern about Rajya Sabha disruptions. The opposition protested the Bihar Special Intense Revision. The government rejected discussion demands, citing constitutional provisions and a sub judice matter.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/lost-53-hours-and-21-minutes-kiren-rijiju-on-parliament-logjam-cites-1997-resolution/articleshow/123184215.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/lost-53-hours-and-21-minutes-kiren-rijiju-on-parliament-logjam-cites-1997-resolution/articleshow/123184215.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 13:49:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1261618" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123184845,imgsize-1261618.cms"/></item><item><title>Bengaluru: Girl shares private videos with friend, clips surface on 23 porn sites</title><description><![CDATA[A Bengaluru student, Clara, faced immense distress after private videos shared with a friend, Anoop, surfaced online, including pornographic websites. An Instagram user, Rony Ronel, then demanded money to remove the videos, threatening further distribution.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/bengaluru-girl-shares-private-videos-with-friend-faces-online-blackmail/articleshow/123171279.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/bengaluru-girl-shares-private-videos-with-friend-faces-online-blackmail/articleshow/123171279.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 04:07:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>H M CHAITHANYA SWAMY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="32054" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123181052,imgsize-32054.cms"/></item><item><title>Stunt on Thar roof lands woman, driver in trouble; FIR filed</title><description><![CDATA[Gurgaon police have registered a case against a woman and a male driver for performing a dangerous stunt on the Delhi-Jaipur highway. Authorities filed charges at DLF Sector 29 police station, citing endangerment to themselves and others.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/gurgaon/fir-against-two-for-performing-stunt-on-moving-car-on-nh8-in-gurgaon/articleshow/123174482.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/gurgaon/fir-against-two-for-performing-stunt-on-moving-car-on-nh8-in-gurgaon/articleshow/123174482.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 00:50:47 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>NIKHIL SHARMA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2402" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123174481,imgsize-2402.cms"/></item><item><title>'We got involved directly': US reiterates India-Pak ceasefire claim</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/we-got-involved-directly-us-reiterates-india-pakistan-ceasefire-claim-marco-rubio-calls-trump-president-of-peace/articleshow/123182616.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/we-got-involved-directly-us-reiterates-india-pakistan-ceasefire-claim-marco-rubio-calls-trump-president-of-peace/articleshow/123182616.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 12:30:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="900892" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123182733,imgsize-900892.cms"/></item><item><title>'Why just Air India?': SC rejects plea seeking safety audit after AI171 crash</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court declined to hear a PIL seeking an independent safety audit of Air India following a fatal crash on June 12 involving a Boeing 787 Dreamliner. He also mentions concerns about Ajinkya Rahane's batting. Changes in Rajasthan Royals' strategy may have influenced Samson's decision.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/ipl/top-stories/ipl-trade-rumours-pundit-suggests-csk-sign-sanju-samson-as-ms-dhoni-replacement-by-releasing-r-ashwin/articleshow/123185010.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/ipl/top-stories/ipl-trade-rumours-pundit-suggests-csk-sign-sanju-samson-as-ms-dhoni-replacement-by-releasing-r-ashwin/articleshow/123185010.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 14:48:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="207946" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123185105,imgsize-207946.cms"/></item><item><title>Huma Qureshi's cousin murdered: Chilling visuals from crime scene emerge</title><description><![CDATA[Asif Qureshi, relative of Bollywood actor Huma Qureshi, was murdered in Delhi. Two brothers, Gautam and Ujjwal, have been arrested. Ujjwal initiated the attack. Police have registered a murder case. Investigation is currently underway.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/huma-qureshis-cousin-murdered-chilling-visuals-from-crime-scene-emerge-asif-was-stabbed-multiple-times-by-duo/articleshow/123179651.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/huma-qureshis-cousin-murdered-chilling-visuals-from-crime-scene-emerge-asif-was-stabbed-multiple-times-by-duo/articleshow/123179651.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 10:01:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="4095319" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123182348,imgsize-4095319.cms"/></item><item><title>'Only Tamil and English to continue': Stalin rolls out new education policy for TN</title><description><![CDATA[Tamil Nadu CM M.K. Stalin has unveiled the state's new education policy, crafted in response to the Centre's National Education Policy (NEP). The state government strongly opposes the NEP, viewing it as a Hindi imposition and against social justice.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chennai/amid-language-row-tamil-nadu-cm-mk-stalin-rolls-out-new-education-policy-for-state/articleshow/123180872.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chennai/amid-language-row-tamil-nadu-cm-mk-stalin-rolls-out-new-education-policy-for-state/articleshow/123180872.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 11:03:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="31576" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123180816,imgsize-31576.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG | On-field shenanigans kept the series dramatic - here's why</title><description><![CDATA[The Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy between India and England emerged as an era-defining rivalry, marked by record-breaking performances and intense confrontations. Shubman Gill's captaincy and England's 'Bazball' approach set the stage for a heated series filled with on-field clashes and emotional spikes. Despite the drama and verbal exchanges, moments of respect and sportsmanship highlighted the enduring appeal of Test cricket.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/grow-some-b-to-handshake-snubs-how-on-field-shenanigans-kept-the-india-vs-england-series-on-its-toes/articleshow/123183129.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/grow-some-b-to-handshake-snubs-how-on-field-shenanigans-kept-the-india-vs-england-series-on-its-toes/articleshow/123183129.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 13:31:28 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>HIJAM RAJU SINGH</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="83470" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123183614,imgsize-83470.cms"/></item><item><title>'Sign declaration or apologise': EC counters Rahul over 'vote chori' claim</title><description><![CDATA[The Election Commission confronts Rahul Gandhi over electoral fraud claims. They demand he signs a declaration supporting his allegations. Alternatively, the commission wants an apology. Gandhi alleges vote manipulation in Karnataka. He accuses the EC of colluding with the BJP. The EC denies destroying evidence. They state Gandhi failed to respond to earlier requests for proof.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sign-the-declaration-or-apologise-ec-terms-rahul-gandhis-vote-chori-claim-absurd-asks-lop-to-prove-charge/articleshow/123181972.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sign-the-declaration-or-apologise-ec-terms-rahul-gandhis-vote-chori-claim-absurd-asks-lop-to-prove-charge/articleshow/123181972.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 12:07:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1013260" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123181949,imgsize-1013260.cms"/></item><item><title>Cricket: Kohli’s 2018 masterclass vs England still outshines Gill’s run-fest in 2025</title><description><![CDATA[Shubman Gill's stellar performance in the drawn Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy has sparked comparisons with Virat Kohli's 2018 tour. Gill amassed 754 runs, surpassing Kohli's series total, but Kohli's innings was played in tougher conditions. While Gill's series was exceptional, Kohli's resilience in 2018 remains a testament to his fighting spirit.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/virat-kohlis-2018-masterclass-against-england-still-outshines-shubman-gills-run-fest-in-2025/articleshow/123182315.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/virat-kohlis-2018-masterclass-against-england-still-outshines-shubman-gills-run-fest-in-2025/articleshow/123182315.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 12:36:20 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PRANAV SHUKLA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="38048" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123182759,imgsize-38048.cms"/></item><item><title>With Trump’s 50% tariffs looming, India reviews market access offer to US</title><description><![CDATA[Despite increased US tariffs on crude oil trade with Russia, India is reassessing its market access offers to the US, aiming to finalize a trade deal this month. While committed to protecting its agricultural and dairy sectors, India is exploring improvements in other areas.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/india-us-trade-deal-with-donald-trumps-50-tariffs-looming-india-reviews-market-access-offers-for-us-but-red-lines-on-agriculture-dairy-stay/articleshow/123182678.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/india-us-trade-deal-with-donald-trumps-50-tariffs-looming-india-reviews-market-access-offers-for-us-but-red-lines-on-agriculture-dairy-stay/articleshow/123182678.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 12:33:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="65312" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123182687,imgsize-65312.cms"/></item><item><title>The curious case of India’s teacher shortage and rising literacy</title><description><![CDATA[India’s literacy rate is rising, but a severe teacher shortage threatens future gains. States like Bihar, Punjab, Karnataka, and Rajasthan face tens of thousands of vacancies, with many schools staffed by only one or two teachers. Budget cuts, slow recruitment, and unattractive working conditions fuel the crisis, risking ‘functional illiteracy’ despite glowing literacy statistics.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/the-curious-case-of-indias-teacher-shortage-and-rising-literacy-a-crisis-waiting-to-explode/articleshow/123184027.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/the-curious-case-of-indias-teacher-shortage-and-rising-literacy-a-crisis-waiting-to-explode/articleshow/123184027.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 13:39:59 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="30550" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123184029,imgsize-30550.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <description><![CDATA[“By combining Meta AI with WhatsApp, Meta appears capable of channelling its customer base into the emerging market, not through merit-based competition, but by “imposing” the availability of the two distinct services upon users, potentially harming competitors,” the Italian authority said.]]></description>

      <guid><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/technology/italy-competition-authority-raids-meta-over-ai-in-whatsapp-abuse-probe-19646558.htm]]></guid>
      <category><![CDATA[Business]]></category>
      <media:content height="675" width="1200" medium="image" url="https://images.cnbctv18.com/uploads/2023/07/Meta.jpg"/>
    </item>

      <description><![CDATA[“You know, I don't think that's a technology problem. We could do that, but I think its much more of a privacy airline issue,” Ortberg said.       <description><![CDATA[The company's Q1FY26 standalone revenue from operations fell 4.2% to ₹42,572 crore against ₹44,427 crore a year ago.
